comment.author: 52583849@N04
comment._content:
Gerbrecht W 3 
built for the Deutsche Seeflug-Wettbewerb race in 1926 but not completed in time. It was never registered. Final assembly was carried out at the Arado plant.

comment.author: 10659106@N00
comment._content: Good work! It looked Germanic to me. I was thinking it might be a Spartan Cruiser, but it just didn't work. ...an extremely obscure aircraft!
